properties.entry: SELECT LANGUAGE_NAME FROM TB_LANGUAGE JOIN BRTB_LANG ON (TB_LANGUAGE.LANGUAGE_NO = BRTB_LANG.LANGUAGE_NO) JOIN TB_NATION ON (BRTB_LANG.NATION_NO = TB_NATION.NATION_NO) WHERE TB_NATION.NATION_NO = ?
SELECT VOL_NAME FROM TB_VOLTAGE JOIN BRTB_VOL ON (TB_VOLTAGE.VOL_NO = BRTB_VOL.VOL_NO) JOIN TB_NATION ON (BRTB_VOL.NATION_NO = TB_NATION.NATION_NO) WHERE TB_NATION.NATION_NO = ?

SELECT CURRENCY_NAME FROM TB_CURRENCY JOIN BRTB_CURRENCY ON (BRTB_CURRENCY.CURRENCY_NO = TB_CURRENCY.CURRENCY_NO) JOIN TB_NATION ON (BRTB_CURRENCY.NATION_NO = TB_NATION.NATION_NO) WHERE TB_NATION.NATION_NO = ?
SELECT VISA_NO, VISA_NAME FROM TB_VISA ORDER BY VISA_NO
UPDATE BRTB_VISA SET VISA_NO = ? WHERE NATION_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_LANGUAGE ( LANGUAGE_NO, LANGUAGE_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_LAN.NEXTVAL, ? )
INSERT INTO TB_CURRENCY ( CURRENCY_NO, CURRENCY_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_CUR.NEXTVAL, ? )
INSERT INTO BRTB_VISA ( VISA_NO, NATION_NO ) VALUES ( ?, ? )
INSERT INTO BRTB_VOL ( VOL_NO, NATION_NO ) VALUES ( ?, ? )
INSERT INTO BRTB_CURRENCY ( CURRENCY_NO, NATION_NO ) VALUES ( ?, ? )
INSERT INTO BRTB_LANG ( LANGUAGE_NO, NATION_NO ) VALUES ( ?, ? )
